name: Grocery Stacker
description:
You need the foods. Time to get the foods at the store. Stack those foods on the scanner. You only get 30 seconds to stack as many foods as you can.

Click food with the left mouse point, drag and then release to drop.

Created for the Halifax Game Collective meetup theme of FOOD. Theme contributed by Mason Palos (@online_frog).

Thanks to rogueNoodle for ideas/feedback.

Credits

Game by Adam Hartling (@XenosNS) - 2016
Created in GameMaker: Studio

Images sourced from vintage materials online. I claim no ownership or copyright on them.
